messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

automatically assign update confluence tickets to am update confluence has assigned hi dear please kind future assign these types tickets queue thank best regards engineer friday update confluence has assigned hi please find queue friday update confluence has assigned hello please advised record number has assigned please review details take appropriate action reference number details description regular confluence done every st location generic location please link kind regards ref msg
